name: vcenterws
description: vcenterws generated with Skaffolder Angular 4 - Node JS template

scripts.install: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently --raw "cd server && npm start" "cd client && ng build --watch"
scripts.build: concurrently --raw "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.debug: concurrently --raw "cd server && npm run debug" "cd client && npm run build"
